title: Kia Drops Stunning 2026 Sportage Lease Deals For November
description: In the busy compact crossover segment, the Toyota RAV4 and Honda CR-V lead the way on the sales charts, but there are flashier rivals if you’re not loyal to one of the Japanese brands. descriptionSummary: In the crowded compact crossover market, the Toyota RAV4 and Honda CR-V dominate sales figures. For those open to alternatives, the refreshed Kia Sportage offers a stylish twist on the usual suspects, boasting a sleek redesign and premium interior upgrades for 2026.

title: Mazda Surprises Everyone With a Fresh 2026 Update for the Mazda2
description: The Mazda2 has been gone from the US for more than a decade now, slipping out just as the then-new generation arrived globally. That generation is still the one on sale today. Before the company unified its naming, the model lived its early life in Japan as the Demio, and the third iteration has ...
titleSummary: "Mazda Shocks Fans with a Revamped 2026 Lineup for Its Pocket-Sized Icon"
descriptionSummary: The Mazda2 has been absent from US showrooms for over a decade, its American departure coinciding with the global debut of a new generation still sold here today.

title: $20.6M Gordon Murray S1 LM Becomes the Most Expensive New Car Ever Sold at Auction
description: Gordon Murray's contribution to the world of motorsports and supercars is almost unmatched by any individual or company. His journey began as an engineer and designer of F1 cars back in the late '60s for Brabham (where his car won multiple championships), and eventually led him to McLaren, where ...

descriptionSummary: Gordon Murray's impact on motorsports and supercars is unparalleled. He started as a pioneering F1 engineer and designer at Brabham in the late 1960s, later joining forces with McLaren and making a lasting mark on the sport.

title: Kia K4 Hatchback Debuts With Shockingly Low Price
description: Kia has finally confirmed pricing for the new K4 Hatchback, and the numbers are the headline. The EX opens at $24,890, placing the K4 among the most affordable compact hatches on sale while offering space, technology, and versatility that usually sit in a higher price bracket. descriptionSummary: Kia has unveiled pricing for its highly anticipated K4 Hatchback, with a starting point of $24,890 that positions it as one of the most budget-friendly options in the compact hatch segment.

title: The Real Reason Dealers Talk You Out of EVs
description: EV maintenance costs are not the problem for you. They’re a problem for your dealer. New-car margins are thin, so the real money comes from the “fixed ops” side of the house — parts and service — where gross margins often live in the 45–55% range, far higher than new-vehicle sales. When you pay for ...
titleSummary: Dealers' Dirty Secret: Why They Might Be Steering You Away from Electric Vehicles
descriptionSummary: Dealers' profit margins on new cars are slim, but lucrative revenue streams come from maintenance and repair services, which typically boast significantly higher profit margins of 45-55%.

title: Genesis Magma GT Concept Offers a Striking New Take on the Porsche 911 Formula
description: Audi has RS, BMW has M, and Mercedes has AMG. Heck, even Hyundai has N for its range of hotter performance models. Now, it's Genesis' turn to get an in-house tuning division. It's called Magma, and the first model to get that treatment is the GV60 Magma, which just made its world premiere in ...

title: 1985 Nissan 300ZX 2+2 For Sale with 67,000 Miles Looks Practically Brand-New
description: Clean, low-mileage Nissan Z-cars from the ’80s aren’t exactly easy to find, especially ones that have been babied since day one. But this 1985 Nissan 300ZX 2+2, showing over 67,000 miles, appears to be one of those rare survivors. The current seller says it’s finally time to let it go, despite Mrs. ...

descriptionSummary: A low-mileage, meticulously maintained 1985 Nissan 300ZX 2+2 has come onto the market, boasting an incredibly low 67,000 miles and a pristine condition that's a rare find in its era.

title: It's a Shame That America Never Got this Toyota Camry Wagon
description: Zoomers and younger millennials will probably be surprised at the fact that the Toyota Camry was once offered as a station wagon. The first generation offered a liftback option halfway between a sedan and a wagon, but the real long-roof version came in the second generation. The first Camry wagon ...
titleSummary: "America Misses Out on the Ultimate Utility Vehicle: Toyota's Forgotten Camry Wagon"
descriptionSummary: For many Gen Z-ers and younger millennials, it may come as a shock that the Toyota Camry was once available as a station wagon. The second-gen model brought the real deal, after an earlier liftback option.

title: Kia Drops Killer 2026 Sorento Lease Deals For November
description: If you need a three-row crossover that’s high on value, the Kia Sorento is one of the most affordable options. It’s also one of the most stylish crossovers in its class, especially after its mid-cycle update for the 2024 model year. The Sorento is also available with hybrid and plug-in hybrid ...

descriptionSummary: The Kia Sorento offers a winning combination of affordability, style, and versatility, making it a top choice for three-row crossover shoppers. Its sleek design shines in the updated 2024 model, while eco-friendly options abound, including hybrid and plug-in hybrid powertrains.

descriptionSummary: In China, Buick's designers have unveiled an exciting new concept, billed as a high-end vehicle that balances fun with family-friendly features. The project, spearheaded by Sangmin Kim, is a key innovation from GM's local Advanced Design team.

title: Inside the Texas Facility That Rebuilds the U.S. Military’s Humvees
description: Humvees, officially known as HMMWVs (High Mobility Multi-Purpose Wheeled Vehicles), are rugged military machines built to handle a wide range of combat roles. Although these are being slowly phased out for newer, more advanced JLTVs (Joint Light Tactical Vehicles), Humvees still play an integral ...
titleSummary: "Where War-Torn Humvees Come to Get Back on Wheels Again in Texas"
descriptionSummary: Rugged and versatile, High Mobility Multipurpose Wheeled Vehicles have long served as trusted workhorses in military operations, tackling a variety of combat roles despite being gradually replaced by the Joint Light Tactical Vehicle.

title: Fiat 500 Hybrid Makes the Nissan Kicks Look Like a Rocket
description: The Fiat 500 Hybrid is officially back in the brand’s lineup, and production has already started at the Mirafiori plant in Turin. Offered in Hatchback, 3+1, and Cabrio body styles, it arrives in Pop, Icon, and La Prima trims, plus the Torino launch edition that nods to the model’s birthplace. ...

It comes in three bodystyles - hatchback, coupe-like 3+1, and convertible cabriolet - in four distinct trim levels: Pop, Icon, La Prima, and a special Torino launch edition that pays homage to its Italian heritage.

title: Ford Still Makes a Sedan — And There's No Chance of It Coming to the US
description: We get it – crossovers, SUVs, and pickups sell, and sedans, hatchbacks, and wagons aren't as profitable anymore. Ford took that to heart in 2018 by saying it would be axing its lower-riding vehicles that aren't badged as Mustangs. We can only imagine the riot if Ford even hinted at killing off ...

descriptionSummary: As sales of crossovers, SUVs, and pickups continue to soar, many automakers are rethinking their sedans, hatchbacks, and wagons. Ford's 2018 pivot marked a turning point, with lower-riding models meeting the axe. The backlash against such a move would likely be fierce.

title: Nissan Pathfinder Could Return to Its Roots as a Body-on-Frame SUV
description: The Nissan Pathfinder has never stayed in one lane for long. Its earliest versions were unapologetically truck-like, built on the same bones as Nissan's Hardbody pickup and aimed squarely at drivers who actually needed ground clearance and a proper frame. description: Although the Bronco and Bronco Sport are incredibly successful models in Ford’s lineup, they are not without their problems. description: The Xterra was once Nissan's straight-cut rival to the Toyota 4Runner – compact enough to maneuver, rugged enough for trails, and stripped of anything unnecessary. It survived for two generations until its eventual discontinuation in 2015. However, it's become increasingly clear Nissan intends to ...

descriptionSummary: Nissan's Xterra was a trailblazing SUV that effortlessly balanced agility with off-road prowess, jettisoning frills for functional simplicity. After a successful run spanning two generations, it ceased production in 2015. Recent hints suggest its spirit may live on.

title: These Luxury Brands Came Out On Top Of Sales Satisfaction
description: Every year, J.D. Power sends out tens of thousands of surveys to people who buy or lease a new car. Power then assembles a list of the automakers that top ...

descriptionSummary: J.D. Power conducts an annual survey of thousands of new vehicle owners, gathering feedback on purchase experiences including dealership interactions, website engagement, and delivery processes. The resulting rankings highlight the top-performing automakers.

descriptionSummary: A devastating four-alarm fire erupted at the Novelis aluminum plant in Scriba, New York on Thursday morning, adding to the facility's recent string of incidents and further straining Ford's already precarious supply chain operations.

title: Uruguay Switched to EVs When Gas Hit $7, Would Americans Do the Same?
description: Uruguay has become an unlikely electric vehicle success story, with EVs now representing about 25% of all new vehicle sales, doubling their market share from last year. The reason? Gasoline now costs around $7.40 per gallon at the pump, making it one of the most expensive places in the world to ...
titleSummary: Uruguay's Electric Vehicle Shift: Can Rising Fuel Prices Trigger a US Revolution?
descriptionSummary: Uruguay has emerged as a surprising leader in electric vehicle adoption, with nearly a quarter of new car sales going to EVs - more than double last year's figure. Gas prices have skyrocketed, hitting over $7 per gallon locally.

Despite significant discounts, sales have declined over the last two or so years, while the planned Gladiator hybrid was scrapped before it even reached the market.  But Jeep is forging ahead with a few improvements to ...

descriptionSummary: The latest Audi Q3 has been unveiled in Europe with a bold new design, cutting-edge technology, and enhanced performance capabilities. As it makes its US debut for the 2026 model year, enthusiasts can expect a price tag to match its upgraded features.
